structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 3, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 5, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4149b-10.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Evidence of validity of tax proceedings.
